description: Situated in the foothills around Lake Maggiore, this colourful and welcoming restaurant has a pleasantly relaxed ambience. The skilful chef creates cuisine inspired by the region (as well as further afield) that showcases top-quality ingredients, including dishes such as veal tongue with barbecued prawns and carrots. An interesting wine list and friendly service complete the picture.
